'''''Minecraft: Soothing Synths (Monolism Remix)''''' is an {{w|Extended play|extended play}} released for ''Minecraft'', featuring compositions by [[Aaron Cherof]] and remixed by Monolism. It consists of the songs that were released as the [[Minecraft: Trails & Tales (Original Game Soundtrack)|soundtrack]] for [[Trails & Tales]], but remixed in a "{{w|Lo-fi music|lo-fi}} {{w|Synthwave|synthwave}}" style. It was released on September 18, 2023.<ref>{{ytl|jAS-GKmQ_5o|Minecraft LoFi: Soothing synths for mining blocks|Minecraft|September 18, 2023}}</ref> Alongside the ''[[MCD:Tranquil Beats (Lo-Fi Remix)|Minecraft Dungeons]]'' and ''[[MCL:Laid Back Lutes (Remix)|Minecraft Legends]]'' remixes, one track from the EP is featured in the Minecraft Launcher and could be toggled with the play button in the top-right corner.
